reviewText:
Whoopi Goldberg's movie is a pretty good musical (done in Africa).
The other 5 films are violent (some with excessive swearing) and not worth watching.
Watch out for collections of movies on a DVD.  Usually one film is OK and the rest are mediocre to poor.
Six movies, all good--some really, really good

What a great deal!. These movies are very clear and the sound is very good. These are all attention getters. I watched them one weekend when it was cold and snowing outside. All of them were good. I can not believe I paid such a great price for these major stars. This is a great movie value. I will be looking for deals like this again and again!!
I love this movies its is the best I have now I thanks you so much for it o.k. one love .bro/sis
what a great price for several liked movies, and i would for sure order again a deal like this. thanks
